thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 707
thread.title: ROBERT
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by ROBERT

author: ROBERT
title: ROBERT
text:
The staff at Redspot reception were friendly and businesslike, and did not harangue me when I declined the daily collision waiver of approx $35.
They explained policy on damages to the vehicle and then clearly described the carpark plan.
The car, a Kia Rio, ran smoothely and was suitable for all my trips there in the valley between Newcastle and the vineyards. Even with four adults several times.
Very simple return.
YES I would rent from Redspot in future.
